casebody.data:
ATTORNEY GRIEVANCE COMMISSION OF MARYLAND v. RICHARD VERNON JOHNSON [Misc. (BV) No. 19,

September Term, 1982.]

Order filed October 21, 1982.

Consent to disbarment filed by Richard Vernon Johnson in accordance with Maryland Rule BV12 d 2.

Richard Vernon Johnson is disbarred by consent from the further practice of law in the State of Maryland and his name stricken from the register of attorneys in this Court.
